cause.description:
Why r we raised up to believe in thoughts and opinions of our ancestors regardless they're wrong or right?!! Why do we have to jusdge anything just because it's different without thinking that it might be even better?!! Why do some people claim to be openminded in trivial issues while they're very close n narrow minded in more important ones?!!
1. Northerns "african arabs" n Southerns should be equal..
cause.name: Racism in Sudan!!
